ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( AND( NOT(ISNULL( Address__c )), NOT(ISNULL( City__c )), REGEX( State__c , "^[A-Z]{2}$"), REGEX( Zip_Code__c , "^\\d{5}(\\-\\d{4})?$") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Address and City may not be null. State must be a 2-digit letter code, and Zip Code must be in either '#####' or '#####-####' format.
